        def possible_values_options_with_extended(obj = nil)


    		
  

  

  

    
      21
    
    
      
            case field_format


    		
  

  

  

    
      22
    
    
      
            when 'project'


    		
  

  

  

    
      23
    
    
      
                if obj.is_a?(User)


    		
  

  

  

    
      24
    
    
      
                    projects = Project.visible(obj).all
